Package Proximity_Encryption_Suite

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account_Current
    The Account_Current.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to view some details about the account they are logged into.
    Account_Management
    The Account_Management.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to modify their account details such as username, password, email and security options.
    Device_Add
    The Device_Add.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to link a mobile device to their account.
    Device_Current
    The Device_Current.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to view the device they currently have connected to the suite.
    Device_Delete
    The Device_Delete.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to delete a device from the account.
    Device_Discovery
    The Device_Discovery.Java Class implements an method of searching for mobile devices using the BlueCove API.
    Device_Management
    The Device_Management.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to alter a devices details such as the pin that is connected to the device.
    Device_Monitoring_Thread
    The Device_Monitoring_Thread.Java Class implements an method of checking the status of a connection between a mobile device and the application.
    Device_Service
    The Device_Service.Java Class implements an method to check what services the mobile device can offer to determine if it can be used with the application.
    Encryption_AES
    The Encryption_AES.Java Class implements an method to encrypt files using the encryption standard of AES.
    Encryption_DES
    The Encryption_DES.Java Class implements an method to encrypt files using the encryption standard of DES.
    Encryption_Script
    The Encryption_Script.Java Class implements an method to encrypt files when the user changes there password.
    Encryption_Triple_DES
    The Encryption_Triple_DES.Java Class implements an method to encrypt files using the encryption standard of Triple DES.
    File_Loading_Thread
    The File_Loading_Thread.Java Class implements an method to gather the related files a user whats to add or view on the system and gets there details for each in the background.
    Files_Add
    The Files_Add.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to add files to system, they can add files, folders, drives or external devices.
    Files_Add_Duplicates
    The Files_Add_Duplicates.Java Class implements an application that notifies the user if they are trying to add a file that is all ready in the folder they have chosen.
    Files_Decryption
    The Files_Decryption.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to decrypt the files on the system.
    Files_Encryption
    The Files_Encryption.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to encrypt the files on the system.
    Files_Remove
    The Files_Remove.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to remove files from the system.
    Folder_Create
    The Folder_Create.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to create different folders on the system to store different files.
    Folder_Current
    The Folder_Current.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to view the details of the current folder.
    Folder_Delete
    The Folder_Delete.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to delete a folder on the system.
    Folder_Management
    The Folder_Management.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to modify a folder on the system.
    Login_Account
    The Login_Account.Java Class implements an application that allows a users enter their username and password so why can be given access to the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Login_Account_Create
    The Login_Account_Create.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to create an account so why can be given access to the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Login_Account_Recover
    The Login_Account_Recover.Java Class implements an application that allows a users recover certain account details so why can be given access to the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Login_Account_Recover_Password
    The Login_Account_Recover_Password.Java Class implements an application that allows a users chose the new password for their account so why can be given access to the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Login_Device
    The Login_Device.Java Class implements an application that allows a users select their device and enter a password so why can be given access to the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Suite_Database
    The Suite_Database.Java Class implements the database features such as implementing the database if it has not been created, storing the connection details.
    Suite_Window
    The Suite_Window.Java Class implements an application that allows a users use all of the features that are currently implemented using the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Support_About
    The Support_About.Java Class implements an application that allows a users to see various information aboutProximity Encryption Suite.
